# The `PPCBranchCoalescing.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Coalesce basic blocks guarded by the same branch condition into a single basic block. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Coalesce basic blocks guarded by the same branch condition into a single basic block.

<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                               PPCBranchCoalescing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Improve scheduling by coalescing branches that depend on the same condition.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This pass looks for blocks that are guarded by the same branch condition</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// and attempts to merge the blocks together. Such opportunities arise from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the expansion of select statements in the IR.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This pass does not handle implicit operands on branch statements. In order</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to run on targets that use implicit operands, changes need to be made in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// canCoalesceBranch and canMerge methods.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Example: the following LLVM IR</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     %test = icmp eq i32 %x 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     %tmp1 = select i1 %test, double %a, double 0.002</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     %tmp2 = select i1 %test, double %b, double 0.005</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// expands to the following machine code:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// %bb.0: derived from LLVM BB %entry</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    liveins: %f1 %f3 %x6</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        &lt;SNIP1&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        %0 = COPY %f1; F8RC:%0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        %5 = CMPLWI killed %4, 0; CRRC:%5 GPRC:%4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        %8 = LXSDX %zero8, killed %7, implicit %rm;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                    mem:LD8&#91;ConstantPool&#93; F8RC:%8 G8RC:%7</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        BCC 76, %5, &lt;%bb.2&gt;; CRRC:%5</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    Successors according to CFG: %bb.1(?%) %bb.2(?%)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// %bb.1: derived from LLVM BB %entry</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    Predecessors according to CFG: %bb.0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    Successors according to CFG: %bb.2(?%)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// %bb.2: derived from LLVM BB %entry</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    Predecessors according to CFG: %bb.0 %bb.1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        %9 = PHI %8, &lt;%bb.1&gt;, %0, &lt;%bb.0&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                    F8RC:%9,%8,%0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        &lt;SNIP2&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        BCC 76, %5, &lt;%bb.4&gt;; CRRC:%5</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    Successors according to CFG: %bb.3(?%) %bb.4(?%)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// %bb.3: derived from LLVM BB %entry</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    Predecessors according to CFG: %bb.2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    Successors according to CFG: %bb.4(?%)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// %bb.4: derived from LLVM BB %entry</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    Predecessors according to CFG: %bb.2 %bb.3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        %13 = PHI %12, &lt;%bb.3&gt;, %2, &lt;%bb.2&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                     F8RC:%13,%12,%2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        &lt;SNIP3&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        BLR8 implicit %lr8, implicit %rm, implicit %f1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// When this pattern is detected, branch coalescing will try to collapse</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// it by moving code in %bb.2 to %bb.0 and/or %bb.4 and removing %bb.3.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If all conditions are meet, IR should collapse to:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// %bb.0: derived from LLVM BB %entry</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    liveins: %f1 %f3 %x6</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        &lt;SNIP1&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        %0 = COPY %f1; F8RC:%0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        %5 = CMPLWI killed %4, 0; CRRC:%5 GPRC:%4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        %8 = LXSDX %zero8, killed %7, implicit %rm;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                     mem:LD8&#91;ConstantPool&#93; F8RC:%8 G8RC:%7</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        &lt;SNIP2&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        BCC 76, %5, &lt;%bb.4&gt;; CRRC:%5</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    Successors according to CFG: %bb.1(0x2aaaaaaa / 2147483648 = 33.33%)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      %bb.4(0x55555554 / 2147483648 = 66.67%)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// %bb.1: derived from LLVM BB %entry</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    Predecessors according to CFG: %bb.0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    Successors according to CFG: %bb.4(0x40000000 / 2147483648 = 50.00%)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// %bb.4: derived from LLVM BB %entry</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    Predecessors according to CFG: %bb.0 %bb.1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        %9 = PHI %8, &lt;%bb.1&gt;, %0, &lt;%bb.0&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                    F8RC:%9,%8,%0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        %13 = PHI %12, &lt;%bb.1&gt;, %2, &lt;%bb.0&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                     F8RC:%13,%12,%2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        &lt;SNIP3&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        BLR8 implicit %lr8, implicit %rm, implicit %f1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Branch Coalescing does not split blocks, it moves everything in the same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// direction ensuring it does not break use/definition semantics.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// PHI nodes and its corresponding use instructions are moved to its successor</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// block if there are no uses within the successor block PHI nodes.  PHI</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// node ordering cannot be assumed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Non-PHI can be moved up to the predecessor basic block or down to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// successor basic block following any PHI instructions. Whether it moves</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// up or down depends on whether the register(s) defined in the instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// are used in current block or in any PHI instructions at the beginning of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the successor block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-ppcbranchcoalescing-cpp-"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcbranchcoalescing-cpp-/ppcbranchcoalescing"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcbranchcoalescing-cpp-/ppcbranchcoalescing/#add8333a5e76125bbe69af183e99c00eb">PPCBranchCoalescing</a> : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunctionpass/#a29c81d2386f4a727c6d33413807530c8">MachineFunctionPass</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MustMoveDown;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MustMoveUp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Analyze the branch statement to determine if it can be coalesced. This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// method analyses the branch statement for the given candidate to determine</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// if it can be coalesced. If the branch can be coalesced, then the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// BranchTargetBlock and the FallThroughBlock are recorded in the specified</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Candidate.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///\\param&#91;in,out&#93; Cand The coalescing candidate to analyze</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///\\return true if and only if the branch can be coalesced, false otherwise</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The analyzeBranch method does not include any implicit operands.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is not an issue on PPC but must be handled on other targets.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For this pass to be made target-independent, the analyzeBranch API</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// need to be updated to support implicit operands and there would</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// need to be a way to verify that any implicit operands would not be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// clobbered by merging blocks.  This would include identifying the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// implicit operands as well as the basic block they are defined in.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This could be done by changing the analyzeBranch API to have it also</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// record and return the implicit operands and the blocks where they are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// defined. Alternatively, the BranchCoalescing code would need to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// extended to identify the implicit operands.  The analysis in canMerge</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// must then be extended to prove that none of the implicit operands are</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This function checks if MI can be moved to the beginning of the TargetMBB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// following PHI instructions. A MI instruction can be moved to beginning of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the TargetMBB if there are no uses of it within the TargetMBB PHI nodes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\param&#91;in&#93; MI the machine instruction to move.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\param&#91;in&#93; TargetMBB the machine basic block to move to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\return true if it is safe to move MI to beginning of TargetMBB,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///         false otherwise.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\param&#91;in&#93; MI the machine instruction to move.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This method checks to ensure the two coalescing candidates follows the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// expected pattern required for coalescing.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\param&#91;in&#93; SourceRegion The candidate to move statements from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\param&#91;in&#93; TargetRegion The candidate to move statements to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\return true if all instructions in SourceRegion.BranchBlock can be merged</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// into a block in TargetRegion; false otherwise.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PPCBranchCoalescing::validateCandidates(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CoalescingCandidateInfo &amp;SourceRegion,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CoalescingCandidateInfo &amp;TargetRegion)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (TargetRegion.BranchTargetBlock != SourceRegion.BranchBlock)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expecting SourceRegion to immediately follow TargetRegion&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!MDT-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinedominatortree/#a0dbb37174d54679518ca9ed1a0e7016e">dominates</a>(TargetRegion.BranchBlock, SourceRegion.BranchBlock))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expecting TargetRegion to dominate SourceRegion&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!MPDT-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortreebase/#a5d344fb542e2d57c633f0161e3a6b231">dominates</a>(SourceRegion.BranchBlock, TargetRegion.BranchBlock))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expecting SourceRegion to post-dominate TargetRegion&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!TargetRegion.FallThroughBlock-&gt;empty() ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><span class="doxyHighlight">           !SourceRegion.FallThroughBlock-&gt;empty())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expecting fall-through blocks to be empty&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This method determines whether the two coalescing candidates can be merged.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// In order to be merged, all instructions must be able to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   1 Move to the beginning of the SourceRegion.BranchTargetBlock;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   2 Move to the end of the TargetRegion.BranchBlock.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Merging involves moving the instructions in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// TargetRegion.BranchTargetBlock (also SourceRegion.BranchBlock).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This function first try to move instructions from the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// TargetRegion.BranchTargetBlock down, to the beginning of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// SourceRegion.BranchTargetBlock. This is not possible if any register defined</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// in TargetRegion.BranchTargetBlock is used in a PHI node in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// SourceRegion.BranchTargetBlock. In this case, check whether the statement</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// can be moved up, to the end of the TargetRegion.BranchBlock (immediately</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// before the branch statement). If it cannot move, then these blocks cannot</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// be merged.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Note that there is no analysis for moving instructions past the fall-through</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// blocks because they are confirmed to be empty. An assert is thrown if they</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// are not.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\param&#91;in&#93; SourceRegion The candidate to move statements from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\param&#91;in&#93; TargetRegion The candidate to move statements to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\return true if all instructions in SourceRegion.BranchBlock can be merged</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///         into a block in TargetRegion, false otherwise.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcbranchcoalescing-cpp-/ppcbranchcoalescing/#a481db3ca9a03829503a402a2318a27b1"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcbranchcoalescing-cpp-/ppcbranchcoalescing/#a481db3ca9a03829503a402a2318a27b1">PPCBranchCoalescing::canMerge</a>(CoalescingCandidateInfo &amp;SourceRegion,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                CoalescingCandidateInfo &amp;TargetRegion)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!validateCandidates(SourceRegion, TargetRegion))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Walk through PHI nodes first and see if they force the merge into the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SourceRegion.BranchTargetBlock.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Merge the instructions from SourceRegion.BranchBlock,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// SourceRegion.BranchTargetBlock, and SourceRegion.FallThroughBlock into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// TargetRegion.BranchBlock, TargetRegion.BranchTargetBlock and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// TargetRegion.FallThroughBlock respectively.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The successors for blocks in TargetRegion will be updated to use the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// successors from blocks in SourceRegion. Finally, the blocks in SourceRegion</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// will be removed from the function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A region consists of a BranchBlock, a FallThroughBlock, and a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// BranchTargetBlock. Branch coalesce works on patterns where the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// TargetRegion&#39;s BranchTargetBlock must also be the SourceRegions&#39;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// BranchBlock.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  Before mergeCandidates:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  +---------------------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  |  TargetRegion.BranchBlock |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  +---------------------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     /        |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    /   +--------------------------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   |    |  TargetRegion.FallThroughBlock |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    \\   +--------------------------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     \\        |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  +----------------------------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  |  TargetRegion.BranchTargetBlock  |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  |  SourceRegion.BranchBlock        |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  +----------------------------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="610"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     /        |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="611"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    /   +--------------------------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="612"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   |    |  SourceRegion.FallThroughBlock |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="613"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    \\   +--------------------------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="614"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     \\        |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="615"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  +----------------------------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="616"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  |  SourceRegion.BranchTargetBlock  |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="617"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  +----------------------------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="619"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  After mergeCandidates:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="620"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="621"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  +-----------------------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="622"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  |  TargetRegion.BranchBlock   |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="623"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  |  SourceRegion.BranchBlock   |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="624"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  +-----------------------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="625"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     /        |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="626"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    /   +---------------------------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="627"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   |    |  TargetRegion.FallThroughBlock  |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="628"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   |    |  SourceRegion.FallThroughBlock  |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="629"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    \\   +---------------------------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="630"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     \\        |</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="633"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  +----------------------------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="634"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="635"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\param&#91;in&#93; SourceRegion The candidate to move blocks from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\param&#91;in&#93; TargetRegion The candidate to move blocks to</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="640"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="641"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SourceRegion.MustMoveUp &amp;&amp; SourceRegion.MustMoveDown) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="648"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Start the merging process by first handling the BranchBlock.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Move any PHIs in SourceRegion.BranchBlock down to the branch-taken block</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Move remaining instructions in SourceRegion.BranchBlock into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TargetRegion.BranchBlock</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> firstInstr =</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> lastInstr =</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;Source = SourceRegion.MustMoveDown</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                  ? SourceRegion.BranchTargetBlock</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                  : TargetRegion.BranchBlock;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/target">Target</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SourceRegion.MustMoveDown</span></CodeLine>
